mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_cs WHERE cs_status = 'A'

SELECT a.cs_code, a.section, a.cs_created, a.cs_status, a.cs_type, a.cs_secret, a.cs_modify, a.cs_title, a.cs_content, a.writer_user_code, b.user_nickname FROM tbl_cs a JOIN tbl_user b on (a.writer_user_code = b.user_code) WHERE a.cs_status = 'A' ORDER BY a.cs_code DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
